bibl.title: A Greek-English Lexicon of the N.T. and Other Early Christian Literature. A translation and adaptation of the 4th revised and augmented edition of Walter Bauer's "Griechisch-Deutsches Wörterbuch zu den Schriften des N.T. und der übrigen urchristlichen Literatur".
bibl.seg: Gingrich F. Wilbur and Frederick W. Danker, A Greek-English Lexicon of the N.T. and Other Early Christian Literature. A translation and adaptation of the 4th revised and augmented edition of Walter Bauer's "Griechisch-Deutsches Wörterbuch zu den Schriften des N.T. und der übrigen urchristlichen Literatur".
Chicago and London, The University of Chicago Press, 1979, 4°, xl-900 pp.
